tool_description: Encode videos in the cloud with the HeyWatch Video Encoding API
name: HeyWatch Video Encoding
title: HeyWatch Video Encoding

api_list.name: GetDownload
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://heywatch.p.rapidapi.com/download/11919867"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heywatch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://heywatch.p.rapidapi.com/download/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heywatch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GenerateEncodedVideoThumbnailsAsync

required_parameters.name: ping_url
required_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when it's done

api_list.name: UploadEncodedVideoToCDN

required_parameters.name: ping_url
required_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when it's done

api_list.name: CreateJob

required_parameters.name: ping_url
required_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when the job is done

optional_parameters.name: keep_channels
optional_parameters.description: Keep the original number of channels

optional_parameters.name: watermark_position
optional_parameters.description: Position of the image: topleft, topright, bottomleft, bottomright

api_list.name: GenerateVideoThumbnailsAsync
api_list.description: Generate a thumbnail in the background

required_parameters.name: ping_url
required_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when it's done

optional_parameters.name: filename
optional_parameters.description: Filename of the thumbnails without the file extension. You must add the special variable #num# which will be replaced by the thumbnail number.

api_list.name: CreateFormat

required_parameters.name: channels
required_parameters.description: 1 for mono, 2 for stereo and 0 to disable audio

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: Category of the format: devices or formats

api_list.name: TransferVideo
api_list.description: Transfer a video to your HeyWatch account for encoding

optional_parameters.name: ping_url
optional_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when the transfer is done

optional_parameters.name: automatic_encode
optional_parameters.description: Automatically encode the video when the transfer is done

optional_parameters.name: format_id
optional_parameters.description: Format ID to use when setting automatic_encode=true

api_list.name: CreateHLSJob
api_list.description: Create m3u8 with multiple bitrate using HLS API

required_parameters.name: format_ids
required_parameters.description: List of HLS Formats separated by comma

required_parameters.name: ping_url
required_parameters.description: Callback URL we request when it's done

optional_parameters.name: m3u8_source_url
optional_parameters.description: The Base URL of the different files. Required if ftp_directive is used
